text: Chance Encounter is a studio album by Ramsey Lewis released in 1982 on Columbia Records. The album reached No. 16 on the Billboard Top Jazz Albums chart. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |+ Chart positions for Chance Encounter ! Chart (1982) !
